title: Gioia Method Data Structure Template
description: Template for building your grounded theory framework using Gioia & Corley's systematic interpretivist approach. Replace all {PLACEHOLDERS} with your domain-specific content.
methodology_note: This structure displays analytical progression from informant-centric terms (1st-order) through researcher-induced concepts (2nd-order) to overarching theoretical constructs (aggregate dimensions).

aggregate_dimensions.name: {YOUR_THEORETICAL_DIMENSION}
aggregate_dimensions.definition: Overarching theoretical construct that YOU developed to organize second-order themes. This is YOUR interpretive abstraction grounded in systematic analysis.
aggregate_dimensions.theoretical_foundation: {What literature or theory informed this dimension}

second_order_themes.name: {RESEARCHER-INDUCED CONCEPT}
second_order_themes.definition: Theoretical concept YOU constructed by interpreting and organizing first-order codes. This represents YOUR analytical abstraction from informant terms.
second_order_themes.researcher_interpretation: Why you grouped these 1st-order concepts together and what theoretical significance you see

first_order_concepts.name: {INFORMANT-CENTRIC TERM}
first_order_concepts.definition: Code that stays close to how participants actually talk about their experience. Uses their language when possible.
first_order_concepts.examples: e.g., 'I had to do something about it', 'tracking what works for me', 'we figured it out together'

example_quotes.quote: Verbatim participant quote demonstrating this concept

first_order_concepts.coding_note: How you distinguish this from related concepts

aggregate_dimensions.name: {SECOND_THEORETICAL_DIMENSION}
aggregate_dimensions.definition: Another overarching construct organizing different themes...

notes: This structure evolves through analysis - expect multiple versions
Stage 1 creates initial structure; Stage 2 refines through AI collaboration
Concepts may move between themes as understanding deepens
Some themes may merge or split during analysis

level_1.name: First-Order Concepts (Informant-Centric Terms)
level_1.your_role: Stay close to data, preserve participant voice

gioia_method_principles.analytical_progression: The structure itself SHOWS how you moved from data (1st) through interpretation (2nd) to theory (aggregate)
gioia_method_principles.rigor_through_transparency: Readers can trace your interpretive moves from quotes → concepts → themes → dimensions

stage1.process: Open coding → axial coding → initial grouping

stage2_phase2.focus: Refine structure through AI-assisted systematic coding
stage2_phase2.output: Comprehensive structure with quotes for all concepts

stage2_phase3.focus: If pattern variations exist, may develop variant structures
stage2_phase3.output: Pattern-specific elaborations or entirely separate structures

stage3.focus: Final theoretical integration and manuscript preparation
stage3.process: YOU synthesize, construct final framework, integrate with literature
stage3.output: Publication-ready data structure with theoretical positioning

domain_examples.note: These show structure versatility - NOT what your content should be!

healthcare_chronic_illness.informant_term: I switched to just noting the really bad days

educational_learning.informant_term: We figured it out by explaining to each other

organizational_leadership.informant_term: I'm myself, but I'm also playing a role

relationship_to_appendix_a.note: This template operationalizes the data structure approach described in your research appendix
